column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A white Toyota Prius car without a license plate hit a central divider
column4: throwing it in the middle of the road.------The incident happened at 1:20 AM on August 29
column5: 2020 at the eastern point of Phnom Penh International Airport along Russian Federation Blvd. in Kbal Damrey Village
column8: Phnom Penh. .------According to sources at the scene
column10: a new white Toyota Prius without license plate was seen traveling along the Russian Federation road from east to west at high speed. When it reached the scene
column11: it swerved to the left and hit the divider
column12: causing a wheel to break in the middle of the road. The car continued to travel more than 100 meters (*an indication of the speed).------After the incident
column13: the local police arrived and contacted the traffic police to measure the vehicle and store it at the Phnom Penh Road Traffic Office
